attributes.action: Build a low brick wall around the perimeter of the UK to deter illegal immigrants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to build a low brick wall around the perimeter of the UK - or, if funds are low, around the main immigration areas - in order to make it more difficult for immigrants to obtain entry.  This will provide work for the newly arrived Polish and be a lot more useful than some other Government-funded projects, e.g. the Dome.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
